executive_summary.core_question: Is the ACI demonstrably smarter today than yesterday?
executive_summary.verdict: MIXED_SIGNALS - Learning occurring but not yet accelerating
key_findings: LIDS pass rate: 30% (6/20 signals pass freshness+confidence)
CNRP execution: 100% success rate across all daemons
executive_summary.ceo_recommendation: Learning is occurring but judgment quality not yet improving. Failure modes accumulating faster than closing.

section_3_cognitive_yield.description: Signals evaluated per day, LIDS pass rates, EQS deltas

lids_gate_analysis.root_cause: Signal pipeline generating signals but evaluation daemon not running continuously
lids_gate_analysis.contextual_discrimination: NOT_YET_IMPLEMENTED - all freshness blocks are threshold-based, not context-aware

eqs_delta_analysis.methodology: Compare stored EQS vs real-time re-evaluation
eqs_delta_analysis.note: Real-time EQS recalculation requires SITC cognitive reasoning pass

section_3_2_judgment_quality.description: Golden Scenario evaluation against fixed reference set
section_3_2_judgment_quality.reason: Historical stress event data (Aug 2024) not available in current database timeframe

brier_score_trend.description: Forecast accuracy via Brier scores (lower is better)

suppression_wisdom_rate.interpretation: More signals being suppressed that should have been acted on

golden_scenario_requirement.action_required: FINN to define canonical stress scenarios from available regime history

section_3_3_error_uncertainty_reduction.description: Failure modes identified, closed, and still open

lessons_created_vs_closed.interpretation: System identifying failures but not acting on them

section_4_learning_velocity.description: LV = (New invariants + Closed failure modes + Validated insights) / (Time × Cognitive Cost)

verdict.interpretation: Learning occurring at 1.4x baseline, but target is 2.5x

section_4_2_inference_compression.description: Anti-memorization check - do fewer rules explain more observations?

verdict.interpretation: System not memorizing - 3 node types cover 194 observations

section_5_lids_learning_signal.description: Day-over-day reduction in LIDS blocks due to unknown staleness

learning_evidence.reason: Shadow evaluation only started today - no day-over-day comparison possible
learning_evidence.recommendation: Run shadow evaluator for 3+ days to establish trend

proposed_acceleration.expected_benefit: Enable SITC real-time re-evaluation for all signals

lv_inequality_check.feasibility: UNCERTAIN - need to validate SITC enables insight generation

recommendation.reason: Cannot justify spend increase until failure mode closure rate improves
recommendation.prerequisite: Close at least 5 open failure modes before proposing acceleration

additional_cognition_rational.evidence: Cannot justify until failure modes being closed

sql_reproducibility.cognitive_yield: SELECT DATE(started_at), daemon_name, COUNT(*), SUM(records_processed) FROM fhq_governance.cnrp_execution_log WHERE started_at >= CURRENT_DATE - 3 GROUP BY 1,2
sql_reproducibility.failure_modes: SELECT lesson_category, lesson_severity, COUNT(*) FROM fhq_governance.epistemic_lessons WHERE action_taken IS NULL GROUP BY 1,2
sql_reproducibility.suppression_regret: SELECT suppression_wisdom_rate, computation_timestamp FROM fhq_governance.suppression_regret_index ORDER BY computation_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
sql_reproducibility.lids_blocks: SELECT DATE(initiated_at), COUNT(*) FROM fhq_governance.governance_actions_log WHERE action_type LIKE 'LIDS_%_BLOCK' GROUP BY 1
sql_reproducibility.api_cost: SELECT usage_date, provider_name, requests_made, usage_percent FROM fhq_governance.api_budget_log ORDER BY usage_date DESC
